message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer.  While I value your interest, $10,000 is just a little too low for me at this time.  I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This is a significant price reduction from my original offer, and I believe it's a fair compromise that reflects the value of the product.  Let me know if you're willing to work with me on this.

I understand your position, Alice. Thank you for considering my previous offer. I am still not able to go above $10,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price given its current condition and market value. I hope we can reach an agreement.
